from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType
from datetime import datetime
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, TimestampType, StringType

spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.absence_all (
   
   
   StaffNumber              STRING,
	AbsType                 STRING,
	SicknessGroup           STRING,
	StartDate               DATE ,
	EndDate                 DATE ,
	AttendanceorAbsenceType STRING,
	Days                    double,
	Hrs                     double,
	Start                   date,
	Endtime                 date,
	Caldays                 double ,
	WorkScheduleRule        STRING ,
	Wkhrs                   double ,
	HrsDay                  double ,
	WkDys                   double ,
	AnnualLeaveStart         date

    )
USING DELTA

%%sql

-- Step 1: Delete all rows from the target table
DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_all;

-- Step 2: Insert data into the target table
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
(   
    StaffNumber,            
    AbsType,                
    SicknessGroup,          
    StartDate,              
    EndDate,                
    AttendanceorAbsenceType,
    Days,                   
    Hrs,                    
    Start,                  
    Endtime,                
    Caldays,                
    WorkScheduleRule,       
    Wkhrs,                  
    HrsDay,                 
    WkDys,                  
    AnnualLeaveStart      
)
SELECT  
    StaffNumber,
    coalesce(AbsType, '') AS AbsType,
    coalesce(SicknessGroup, '') AS SicknessGroup,
    cast(StartDate as date) AS StartDate,
    cast(EndDate as date) AS EndDate,
    AttendanceorAbsenceType,
    Days,
    Hrs,
    CASE 
        WHEN Start = '1899-12-31' THEN to_timestamp(Start || ' 00:00:00.000', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')
        ELSE to_timestamp(Start, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')
    END AS Start,
    CASE 
        WHEN Endtime = '1899-12-31' THEN to_timestamp(Endtime || ' 00:00:00.000', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')
        ELSE to_timestamp(Endtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')
    END AS Endtime,  
    Caldays,
    WorkScheduleRule,
    Wkhrs,
    HrsDay,
    WkDys,
    cast(AnnualLeaveStart as date) as AnnualLeaveStart
FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absence_monthly;

-- Step 3: Remove rows with null values in key columns
DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
WHERE
    StaffNumber IS NULL
    OR StartDate IS NULL
    OR EndDate IS NULL;

-- Step 4: Use MERGE to remove duplicates
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.absence_all AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        StaffNumber, 
        StartDate, 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY StaffNumber, StartDate ORDER BY StaffNumber, StartDate) AS Val
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
) AS source
ON target.StaffNumber = source.StaffNumber
    AND target.StartDate = source.StartDate
    AND source.Val > 1
WHEN MATCHED THEN DELETE;
